0.9.5.name: wordpress/citation-manager
0.9.5.description:
Allows for tracking and display of external citations to WordPress content.

While trackbacks and pingbacks are fine for displaying references from other websites which support them, what do you do when, say, a print newspaper, book or magazine makes reference to your content? Citation Manager provides a solution.
